function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncertain future due to pandemic duration and vaccine availability","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Work from home becoming the norm","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on businesses reliant on office workplace","category":"Discontinuity of restrictions increase unemployment and school closures affect educational outcomes","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Estimating uncertainty by resampling from the estimated variance-covariance matrix of all regression parameters.","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Highly interconnected world facilitating rapid disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on globalization and economic growth as drivers of green investment and sustainable development","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recalibration of the global economic growth model from linear to circular economy could impact disease propagation.","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Localized economic hazards","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shocks to other industries
